t: Amazon.com: FONDX Edible Glue, Clear, 2 fl oz : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: First of, this review is not sponsored by FONDX. I used it on my last cake project and normally fondant on fondant, on the side of a cake, using just water would slide off. This edible glue kept everything in place, and the attached brush made everything even easier.

t: Amazon.com: Fondx Fondant 2lb - Virgin White : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: I had about 4 brands of fondant to taste test and play with before covering my first cake. Two were available from certain craft stores, one an internet store and this one. Out of all of them, Fondx tasted the best. In my opinion it was closer in flavor to a good homemade marshmallow fondant ...

t: FONDX Rolled Fondant 2 lb - Vanilla Flavor, Virgin White : Amazon.ca: Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: I have never tried Fondx brand fondant before. I always use Satin Ice brand, but they do not carry a brown fondant in the vanilla flavor. Satin Ice's brown fondant is a very strong chocolate flavor. I didn't want that flavor for the cake I was making. So, I found Fondx and thought I'd give it a try.
